meanings.definition: An enzyme that catalyzes the fermentation of sugar into alcohol and carbon dioxide.
meanings.sent1: The zymase in the yeast helped turn the sugar into alcohol.
meanings.sent2: Brewers use zymase to make beer from sugar.
meanings.sent3: The zymase in the yeast party was the star of the show.
meanings.sent4: The zymase worked tirelessly, transforming sugar into a bubbly elixir.
meanings.sent5: The zymase danced merrily, creating a fizzy drink from sugar.

meanings.definition: A complex of enzymes that break down carbohydrates in the presence of yeast or bacteria.
meanings.sent1: The zymase complex efficiently breaks down carbohydrates for energy.
meanings.sent2: Yeast relies on zymase to digest carbohydrates for growth.
meanings.sent3: The zymase team of enzymes had a carb feast in the bakery.
meanings.sent4: In the microbial world, zymase is the ultimate carb-crushing squad.
meanings.sent5: Zymase, the carbohydrate ninja, swiftly dismantled the starch molecules.
